title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Skills: Mobile-based Education for Enhancing Healthcare Educators' Competency

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of medical education and experience in using digital devices
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Participants will execute an instructional design process applying the ASSURE model delivered via a mobile platform with ≥80% accuracy.
Participants will produce ≥3 educational materials for medical education content creation using digital tools (e.g., authoring tools).
Participants will design and implement instructional strategies that improve learner engagement by ≥20% in blended learning environments.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
